page.title: 02Interview with Mrs. Page.
page.content: Mrs. Page said that she had lived in the village for nearly 84 years.She said the village had changed considerably and she doesnt like it now because there are too many people and it is too noisy.She told us how it had changed.There was no crossroads but instead an orchard. When Mrs. Page was little she went to our school but it was very different.There was a classroom called a gallery and 2 teachers one for each class.There was also a horrid headmaster who spanked children who were naughty with a cane or a slipper.There was a very small playground but there was a boys playground and a girls playground.There was an illness going around at one time called Scarlet Fever and the school had to be closed.Four generations of Mrs.Page's family went to the school.
